tool_description: Parses and normalizes tracking data from different carriers into a standardized format for internal systems.

raw_tracking_data.description: Raw JSON tracking response from carrier API

carrier_name.description: Name of the carrier that provided the data

normalize_timezone.description: Target timezone for normalizing timestamps (e.g., UTC, EST)

error_messages: Invalid JSON format: raw_tracking_data must be valid JSON string.
Unsupported carrier: Parser not available for specified carrier_name.
Missing required fields: Tracking data lacks essential fields for parsing.
Invalid timezone: normalize_timezone must be a valid timezone identifier.
usage: Pass raw_tracking_data from carrier API along with carrier_name. Optionally specify normalize_timezone for timestamp standardization.

events.description: Array of normalized tracking events with timestamps
